spell.name: Tudros' Electric Field
entries: You charge natural terrain in a 30-foot cube in range with electric particles and sparks of electricity can be seen jumping all around.
Creatures put to sleep or that are sleeping inside the cube automatically wake up.
Attacks and Dexterity saving throws that deal electric damage are made with advantage and disadvantage, respectfully, and deal an additional damage die.

While concentrating on this spell, you can choose a point inside the cube to quickly concentrate all the electric energy. Each creatur inside a 15-foot sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, they take {@damage 7d6} electric damage and half as much on a succesful one.

spell.name: Tudros' Magical Stomp
entries: You stomp on the ground. A magical copy of size Large of your foot appears over a point you can see within range. Creatures inside a 10-foot cube make a Strength saving throw, taking bludgeoning damage equal to {@damage 2d8} + your Strength modifier and are knocked {@condition prone} on a failed save and taking half as much and aren't knocked {@condition prone} on a successful one.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot above 2nd.

spell.name: Crush (WIP)
entries: You attempt to magically crush a creature and test its physical resolve.

The creature must succeed on a Strength saving throw or take {@damage 3d6} + your Strength score bludgeoning damage, be {@condition restrained} and {@condition incapacitated}. You can on each of your turns use your Action to deal X damage automatically.
The spell ends if you use your Action to do anything else.
A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns.

spell.name: Obliterate (WIP)
entries: Each creature in a 20-foot cylinder takes 15 force damage and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save it takes {@damage 12d4} force damage.

spell.name: Earth crush (WIP)
entries: STR sav thro or take {@damage 8d6} force damage and {@condition prone}
